directions: Heat olive oil in a skillet over medium-high heat. Mash banana into the hot oil; cook until slightly browned, 5 to 7 minutes. Stir cereal into the banana mixture; continue cooking until the cereal softens slightly, about 5 minutes more.
ingredients: 3/4 cup high-protein crisp rice and wheat cereal (such as Kellogg's® Special K®)
title: Gina and Russell's Hot Special K® Breakfast Cereal
